questions.text: Where does Lucille get Annyong a job?
questions.explanation:
The banana stand.

	Buster is angry that Lucille's recently adopted son is getting a job only days after living in Lucille's apartment whereas Buster's been living there for many years.  Lucille's maid, Lupe, is depressed because she can't join her family reunion.

questions.text: Lucille gets a paycheck from the Bluth Company.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Lucille is angry that Michael's secretary, Kitty, never mailed her a paycheck, but Michael says that she shouldn't be getting one.  She tells Michael that they're to pay for new outfits and such to keep up with her image.  Buster is also receiving paychecks from the company, so Michael gives him a job.

questions.text: Who gets a job at the Bluth Company to answer phones?
questions.explanation:
Lindsay.

	Lindsay comes by the company to receive her paycheck which was also lost, so Michael gets her to work.  Since Kitty isn't around, he makes Lindsay sit and to the secretarial work for him, but she makes everyone feel like Michael is doing a horrible job.  Meanwhile, Buster gets a bit claustrophobic in his new job, so he asks for a different one.

questions.text: To study for his movie role, Tobias heads to the local prison.  What is is the title of the warden's script?
questions.explanation:
New Warden.

	In an earlier episode, Tobias got a role as 'Frightened Inmate #2', and he wanted to do major research for his bit part.  When he brings a letter of introduction from Carl Weathers, the warden gives him the script to give to Carl.

questions.text: After saying that he wants a new job, Buster gets put to work elsewhere.  What is Buster's second job in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Construction worker.

	Since Buster doesn't like confined or open spaces very much, Michael places him at the new construction site where he's put to work on a new house.  He tells Michael and Gob that he loves his new job, and he finds the rough language on the site very funny.  Gob also gets a job there to earn his paycheck.  Meanwhile, Lindsay changes the office.

questions.text: Who sends the Bluth Company staff out for lunch?
questions.explanation:
Lindsay.

	After thinking that she's in charge, Lindsay changes the office to make everything cozier, and sends the employees out to lunch thinking that they'll just go and buy something.  Michael compares them to sheep saying that they'll just wander around and get lost.  The staff ends up boarding the bus that Lupe had rented for her family reunion.

questions.text: After working so hard at the banana stand, Maeby suggests that George Michael should relax.  Where does he decide to go?
questions.explanation:
To the Bluth Company.

	At the same time, Lindsay tells Michael to take some time off, and he goes to the banana stand to spend time with George Michael, where he's told to go to the beach.  Meanwhile, Gob ruins the construction by telling everyone about the paychecks that he and Buster are receiving.

questions.text: What is the name of the game that Buster and Gob play at the construction site to settle their differences?
questions.explanation:
Chicken.

	The construction workers have them play Chicken to duke it out.  Chicken requires to players to drive bulldozers into each other.  While they play the game, Lindsay is nervous because there's a work stoppage problem.

questions.text: While installing the new lights in the office, investigators planted a hidden camera.  Do they end up getting the evidence file that they were looking for?
questions.explanation:
No.

	While everyone is gone, George Michael finds a folder of items that proves that his dad loves him.  Meanwhile, the investigators go into the office and take the folder thinking that it's the evidence that will ultimately destroy the company, but they soon realize that it isn't.

questions.text: Does Michael solve his subdivision spacing problem?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	In the end, Michael decides to remove all of the individual pools from the houses and make one large communal pool right in the center.  Meanwhile Lupe's family is taken to the worksite, and Lucille shows up with all of her groceries, so Michael decides to have a small party.
